title: Descriptions: Color / Clothing (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Color / Clothing subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.japanese: 白いドレスが欲しいです。
茶色いズボンを買いました。

cards.english: Those yellow-green shoes are cute, aren't they.
cards.romaji: Sono kimidori no kutsu, kawaii desu ne.
cards.japanese: その黄緑の靴、かわいいですね。
